version_description: Thanks for using the Scandic Hotels app! We update the app regularly to make it better. Update to the latest version to get the latest features and improvements.

Thanks for using the Scandic Hotels app! We update the app regularly to make it better. Update to the latest version to get the latest features and improvements.

• We've made major changes to make the app faster.
• Travelling as a large group? You can now book up to 4 rooms per reservation.
• It is now possible to request a booking confirmation via a text message to your phone number (free of charge).
• The app now supports push notifications. If you accept them, we will be able to inform you when you reach the next Scandic Friends level and more.

Thanks for using the Scandic Hotels app! We update the app regularly to make it better. Update to the latest version to get the latest features and improvements.

What's new?
Fixed some bugs, improved sorting and performance, updated frameworks in order to support iOS 12.
Fixed a critical bug in the previous version (2.0.1)
Fixed a bug with the date picker and improved performance

• Skip the queue by checking out in the app!
• Stay logged in for a longer period
• New design for your previous bookings
• See more hotel images
• Bug fixes

• Get more restaurant information when booking
• Get more details on your past stays
• Performance improvements
• Bug fixes
Improved design and usability for a better user experience

Bug fixes & improvements.
